title: low fps at late game
body: I've tried everything on the fps issues article, none could help this. How can i prevent low fps at late game?

replies.body: Frame drops can happen for a few reasons like bad drivers, files, or even hardware.  I'm really bummed to hear that the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide didn't help, though.  In that case, grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to get some logs and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can take a look and work with you individually to resolve this.  See you there!
Thank you, i hope i fix my issue Porocles.
